PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02812023-03-27PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 249, Nova Scotia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 249 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of federal concern; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the post-tropical storm that occurred from September 23 to 25, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 249, Nova Scotia
